PokemonTopScene_Content_Desc:
Choose Pokémon for your helper teams
and organize your Pokémon Box.
PokemonTopScene_EXPBonusPopup_Text_1:
If a helper Pokémon has reached its max
level, any extra Sleep EXP will be added to
the Bonus Gauge instead of to
the Pokémon.
